title: Smartphone-Based Online Mathematics Lecture Quality Assessment Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning environments and grasp of fundamental mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Course on Evaluating Online Lecture Quality for Elementary Mathematics Education in Smartphone-Accessible Limited-Technology Environments. Supports Work-Integrated Learning for Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a checklist-based online math lecture quality assessment tool with 90% accuracy.
Learners can perform suitability judgments with 80% or higher accuracy across five core areas: instructional design, assessment methods, and technological accessibility.
Learners can identify and apply at least three quality improvement resources accessible in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
